title: The phone doesn't chsrge upto 100% if I charge it by switching it off. fast battery drain till 80/85
content:
The phone rarely goes till 100%. Also battery drains fast till 80/85% and after that it's normal drain. I had reboot it too, engineer too visit and did hard reset but still there's a problem.
Earlier battery had problem like sometimes it used to charge fast and sometimes very slow. So engineer came and did hard reset and that problem solved. But now this drain issue is there.
